doc:
Vincent Martella https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Martella 0 Vincent Michael Martella (born October 15, 1992) is an American actor, voice actor and singer. He is best known for his role as Greg Wuliger on the UPN/CW sitcom Everybody Hates Chris, and for the voice of Phineas Flynn in the Disney Channel and Disney XD original animated show Phineas and Ferb. He is also the voice of Hope Estheim in the 2010 video game Final Fantasy XIII and its sequels Final Fantasy XIII-2 and Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII. Vincent_Michael_Martella ( born October_15_,_1992 ) is an_American_actor , voice_actor_and_singer . He is_best_known for his_role as Greg_Wuliger on the_UPN/CW_sitcom_Everybody Hates Chris , and for the_voice of Phineas_Flynn in the_Disney_Channel and Disney_XD_original_animated_show_Phineas_and_Ferb . He is also the_voice of Hope_Estheim in the_2010_video_game Final_Fantasy_XIII and its_sequels Final_Fantasy_XIII-2_and_Lightning_Returns : Final_Fantasy_XIII .
